title: Insights into lithium inventory quantification of LiNi0.5Mn1.5O4–graphite full cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4263-4272
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00842A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wurigumula Bao, Weiliang Yao, Yixuan Li, Baharak Sayahpour, Bing Han, Ganesh Raghavendran, Ryosuke Shimizu, Ashley Cronk, Minghao Zhang, Weikang Li, Ying Shirley Meng
A systematic methodology for the quantification of lithium inventory is developed and the degradation mechanisms of high-voltage lithium batteries are revealed.
